com.github.jpmsilva.jsystemd

Class SystemdSpringApplicationRunListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jpmsilva.jsystemd.SystemdSpringApplicationRunListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.boot.SpringApplicationRunListener

    public class SystemdSpringApplicationRunListener
extends Object
implements org.springframework.boot.SpringApplicationRunListener
    A Spring Application Run Listener that sets up a SystemdNotifyApplicationRunStatusProvider to provide status updates of the current phase of the application life cycle.
    Author:
    Joao Silva
    See Also:
    SpringApplicationRunListener

      • started

        public void started()
        Legacy Spring Boot 1.4 method, provided here to ensure that the library works under previous versions.

        Called immediately when the run method has first started. Can be used for very early initialization.

      • finished

        public void finished(org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext context,
                     Throwable exception)
        Legacy Spring Boot 1.5 method, provided here to ensure that the library works under previous versions.

        Called immediately before the run method finishes.

        Parameters:
        context - the application context or null if a failure occurred before the context was created
        exception - any run exception or null if run completed successfully.
